discussion.p: std::promise is missing a non-member overload of swap. This is inconsistent with other types that provide a swap member function.
Add a non-member overload void swap(promise&& x,promise&& y){ x.swap(y); }

blockquote.p: Create an issue. Move to review, attention: Howard. Detlef will also look into it.
